alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Blanco; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Kendall; Medina; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 11:53PM CDT until June 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Medina County in south central Texas... Southwestern Caldwell County in south central Texas... Southern Hays County in south central Texas... Guadalupe County in south central Texas... Southwestern Blanco County in south central Texas... Central Kendall County in south central Texas... Northwestern Wilson County in south central Texas... Bexar County in south central Texas... Comal County in south central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kendalia to Timberwood Park to Pearson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, San Marcos, Schertz, Kyle, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Buda, Boerne, Selma, Hondo, Floresville, Castroville, Wimberley, Blanco, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB and Canyon Lake Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bexar; Blanco; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Kendall; Medina; Wilson
